Articles.Content:
Hi,  When recovering a vessel the kerbals are gone from the list.  Also the game either crashes or freezes upon ending tutorial or going to the next one. Additionally I can only save one vessel at a time, trying to save another deletes the first saved vessel. After the update the game also randomly crashes and closes out. A red box appears before it closes. Thanks for reading this and have a great day.  My system is a Zenbook pro  Intel I7 with 16 gig ram.  This happens about 50 percent of the time.  The other 50 it runs great and is a lot of fun.  I love KSP and KSP 2. 

-Mike
